pageTitle: Study of Losartan in Pediatric Patients With Hypertension (MK-0954-337) - Study Results - ClinicalTrials.gov
textBeforeTable: Period 1:   12-week Base Study Participant Flow for 2 periods Participants who elected to enter extension; dose level of Losartan was that which was being administered at end of base study Losartan Potassium-Extension Open-label losartan at starting dose of 0.7 mg/kg/day with uptitration at Week 3, 6, or 9 to the next highest dose level if blood pressure goal not achieved Losartan Potassium 0.7 to 1.4 mg/kg Open-label losartan at starting dose of 0.3 mg/kg/day with uptitration at Weeks 3, 6 or 9 to the next highest dose level if blood pressure goal not achieved Losartan Potassium 0.3 to 1.4 mg/kg Open-label losartan at starting dose of 0.1 mg/kg/day with uptitration at Weeks 3, 6, or 9 to the next highest dose level if blood pressure goal not achieved Losartan Potassium 0.1 to 1.4 mg/kg Description   Reporting Groups No text entered. Significant events and approaches for the overall study following participant enrollment, but prior to group assignment
